Ingredients
1/3
cup
toasted almonds

3
tablespoons
balsamic vinegar
1

water
1
tablespoon
honey
1
small
shallot

1
tablespoon
)
1
tablespoons
chopped herbs
(
parsley
,
tarragon
, or
basil
work well)
1/2
cup
canola oil
1/4
cup
extra virgin olive oil
1/2
teaspoon
salt
1/4
teaspoon
freshly ground black pepper
Directions
Combine all ingredients in small container or squeeze bottle. Seal container and shake vigorously until emulsified. Shake again before each use.
